body: HEITAIS YOU BETTER NOT FUCKING COMMENT AGAIN ABOUT YOUR "NEW HENTAI SITE ;)". I HECKED IT OUT, AND ITS NOT THAT GOOD. WHEN I SCROLL DOWN TO THE COMMENT SECTION I WANT TO SEE SHIT LIKE "DAMN THAT MILF HAD SOME NICE TITS MATE". AND SOMETIMES A LITTLE "I WISH I MY GURL COULD MAKE AN AHEAGO FACE LIKE THAT". NOT YOUR BS. IF I EVER SEE YOU ON THIS SITE AGAIN IMMA SLAP THE SHIT OUTTA YOU.
